amendment.description: To ensure that the Secretary does not charge a fee for certain surplus water.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5068 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5068 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 4979.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5068 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 4979.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5068 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
